head.title: Review Under Way For Phone Venture

hedline.hl1: Review Under Way For Phone Venture

block.p: BellSouth in Atlanta and SBC Communications in San Antonio, have begun a review for a joint venture of the merged North American wireless operations of the two companies, a deal which is still under regulatory review.

BellSouth in Atlanta and SBC Communications in San Antonio, have begun a review for a joint venture of the merged North American wireless operations of the two companies, a deal which is still under regulatory review.
Larry Solomon, a spokesman for SBC, confirmed a report of the review that appeared in Advertising Age this week.

He said that a list of 8 to 10 agencies was being created. It includes GSD&M in Austin, Tex., part of the Omnicom Group, the agency that handles wireless advertising for SBC, and West Wayne in Atlanta, the agency that handles wireless advertising for BellSouth.

Mr. Solomon said that the list would be narrowed to four agencies, before a final decision, which is expected in mid-October. Billings were not disclosed, but Advertising Age estimated them at $170 million to $250 million.
